section.title: Security Migration From Previous Versions
section.para: It is recommended that customers who have utilized the internal JDBC membership domain from releases prior to MetaMatrix 5.5 migrate those users and groups to an LDAP compliant directory server. Â Several free and open source directory servers can be used including:
See the JBossAS security documentation for using an LDAP directory server. If there are additional questions or the need for guidance in the migration process, please contact technical support.
